home.title: Welcome to my blog!
home.p-1:
Once upon a time there was a programmer, he developed applications...
And once he decided to write a couple of articles, share experiences, show beautiful code, and even thought about the ideal structure of the application.
home.p-3:
This blog is also an open source project, maybe it will be useful to you. And also you can read a couple of my articles,
when i finish the blog module.
